body: Yes indeed. Set windows_ to True is the way to go about it. Honeybee_Decompose Based on Type shall be used as shown following to review geometry before running simulation.[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/ZP48tQoNiug6mZkGlDoNgFS412YT*aZN3l97Cqd8GO5AIv1GCAL4-jZgmVQbAAoBAUAVJB4imsrbKgZKXJhJ4SNv32vS2ie2/SurfacePreview.png)
